Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL IN BRANSON!!! STAY AWAY!!!”
Reviews.Author: Brittany R
Reviews.Content: stayed sept 2012 worst hotel stayed called night lady front desk answered phone rude sounded little woke check rude impatient roach crawling wall picture frame bed night stand bathrooms alright unacceptable carpet curtains stunk mildew slide night 2 am tired night little bugs crawling front door needless checked night home unclean called trip night short talking rude lady told bugs offered care refund money night stay

Reviews.Title: “ROACHES!!!”
Reviews.Author: catlvr35
Reviews.Content: stayed motel july 28th 29th 2012 wasnt stay shocked finding roaches husband dead roaches manager dont happened havent strange odor entered air freshener didnt alleviate smell sorry staying
